casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 14, 2008

[Cite as 0411412008 Case Announcements, 2008-0hio-1751.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-0594. In re Foreclosure of Lien for Delinquent Taxes by Action in Rem.

Jefferson App. No. 06JE40, 2008-0hio-1173. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of the court of appeals’ judgment, It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.

Lundberg Stratton, J., dissents and would grant the motion upon filing of bond.
